directions: In a large pot over medium heat, cook onion, celery and carrots in oil until they begin to soften.  Stir in potatoes, clams, clam juice, thyme, pepper and bacon.  Bring to a boil, then reduce heat and simmer 20 minutes, or until potatoes are tender.
ingredients: 2 (16 ounce) cans minced clams, with juice
title: Hatteras Style Clam Chowder
